verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, Maschil <WH4905> <WH8688>, A Psalm of David <WH1732>, when Doeg <WH1673> the Edomite <WH130> came <WH935> <WH8800> and told <WH5046> <WH8686> Saul <WH7586>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, David <WH1732> is come <WH935> <WH8804> to the house <WH1004> of Ahimelech <WH288>. Why boastest <WH1984> <WH8691> thou thyself in mischief <WH7451>, O mighty <WH1368> man? the goodness <WH2617> of 'Elohim <WH410> endureth continually <WH3117>.
Thy tongue <WH3956> deviseht <WH2803> <WH8799> mischiefs <WH1942>; like a sharp <WH3913> <WH8794> razor <WH8593>, working <WH6213> <WH8802> deceitfully <WH7423>.
Thou lovest <WH157> <WH8804> evil <WH7451> more than good <WH2896>; and lying <WH8267> rather than to speak <WH1696> <WH8763> righteousness <WH6664>. Selah <WH5542>.
Thou lovest <WH157> <WH8804> all devouring <WH1105> words <WH1697>, O thou deceitful <WH4820> tongue <WH3956>.

'Elohim <WH410> shall likewise destroy <WH5422> <WH8799> thee for ever <WH5331>, he shall take thee away <WH2846> <WH8799>, and pluck thee out <WH5255> <WH8799> of thy dwelling place <WH168>, and root thee out <WH8327> <WH8765> of the land <WH776> of the living <WH2416>. Selah <WH5542>.
The righteous <WH6662> also shall see <WH7200> <WH8799>, and fear <WH3372> <WH8799>, and shall laugh <WH7832> <WH8799> at him:

Lo, this is the man <WH1397> that made <WH7760> <WH8799> not 'Elohim <WH430> his strength <WH4581>; but trusted <WH982> <WH8799> in the abundance <WH7230> of his riches <WH6239>, and strengthened <WH5810> <WH8799> himself in his wickedness <WH1942>.
But I am like a green <WH7488> olive tree <WH2132> in the house <WH1004> of 'Elohim <WH430>: I trust <WH982> <WH8804> in the mercy <WH2617> of 'Elohim <WH430> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5703>.

I will praise <WH3034> <WH8686> thee for ever <WH5769>, because thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804> it: and I will wait <WH6960> <WH8762> on thy name <WH8034>; for it is good <WH2896> before thy saints <WH2623>.
